languages.text: "Что?! Вистенца Вьятт? Губернатор, десятилетиями служившая династии и Империуму самым надлежащим образом? {name}, надеюсь, вы не собираетесь терпеть столь гнусную клевету в адрес одной из лучших ваших слуг!"

traits.locale_text: "Что?! Вистенца Вьятт? Губернатор, десятилетиями служившая династии и Империуму самым надлежащим образом? {name}, надеюсь, вы не собираетесь терпеть столь гнусную клевету в адрес одной из лучших ваших слуг!"

languages.text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"
languages.original_text: "Что?! Вистенца Вьятт? Губернатор, десятилетиями служившая династии и Империуму самым надлежащим образом? {name}, надеюсь, вы не собираетесь терпеть столь гнусную клевету в адрес одной из лучших ваших слуг!"

traits.locale_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"
"What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"
"What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"
"What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

languages.text: 「何だと？ヴィステンツァ・ビャットが？何十年と、王朝と帝国にきちんと仕え続けてきた総督だぞ？{name}、トップクラスに有能な部下がこんな誹謗中傷を受けてるんだ、我慢してやることはない」
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: 「何だと？ヴィステンツァ・ビャットが？何十年と、王朝と帝国にきちんと仕え続けてきた総督だぞ？{name}、トップクラスに有能な部下がこんな誹謗中傷を受けてるんだ、我慢してやることはない」

languages.text: “什么？维丝坦萨·维亚特？那位为王朝与帝国勤恳服务了几十年的总督？{name}，有人在如此无耻地诽谤您优秀的仆人！我希望您不会容忍这样的恶行！”
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: “什么？维丝坦萨·维亚特？那位为王朝与帝国勤恳服务了几十年的总督？{name}，有人在如此无耻地诽谤您优秀的仆人！我希望您不会容忍这样的恶行！”

languages.text: «¿Quién? ¿Vistenza Vyatt? ¿La gobernadora que ha servido con diligencia a la dinastía y al Imperium durante décadas? ¡{name}, espero que no toleres una calumnia tan escandalosa contra una de tus más leales siervas!».
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Quién? ¿Vistenza Vyatt? ¿La gobernadora que ha servido con diligencia a la dinastía y al Imperium durante décadas? ¡{name}, espero que no toleres una calumnia tan escandalosa contra una de tus más leales siervas!».

languages.text: "Was? Vistenza Vyatt? Die Gouverneurin, die der Dynastie und dem Imperium jahrzehntelang treu gedient hat? {name}, Ihr werdet doch nicht derlei Verleumdungen einer Eurer besten Dienerinnen dulden?"
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Vistenza Vyatt? Die Gouverneurin, die der Dynastie und dem Imperium jahrzehntelang treu gedient hat? {name}, Ihr werdet doch nicht derlei Verleumdungen einer Eurer besten Dienerinnen dulden?"

languages.text: « Comment ? Vistenza Vyatt, la gouverneure qui sert consciencieusement la dynastie et l'Imperium depuis des décennies ? {name}, j'espère que vous n'allez pas tolérer une calomnie aussi ignoble à l'encontre de l'une de vos meilleures subordonnées ! »
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? Vistenza Vyatt, la gouverneure qui sert consciencieusement la dynastie et l'Imperium depuis des décennies ? {name}, j'espère que vous n'allez pas tolérer une calomnie aussi ignoble à l'encontre de l'une de vos meilleures subordonnées ! »

languages.text: "Ne? Vistenza Vyatt mı? Hanedanlığa ve İmparatorluk'a olan görevini onlarca yıldır usulünce yerine getiren vali mi? {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, en iyi hizmetkârlarınızdan birine yönelik böyle aşağılayıcı iftiralara tahammül göstermeyeceksiniz umarım!"
languages.original_text: "What? Vistenza Vyatt? The governor who has duly served the dynasty and the Imperium for decades? {name}, I hope you will not stand for such scurrilous slander aimed at one of your finest servants!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Vistenza Vyatt mı? Hanedanlığa ve İmparatorluk'a olan görevini onlarca yıldır usulünce yerine getiren vali mi? {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, en iyi hizmetkârlarınızdan birine yönelik böyle aşağılayıcı iftiralara tahammül göstermeyeceksiniz umarım!"
